org.jhove2.module.format.xml
Class XmlDeclaration

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.format.xml.XmlDeclaration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable
@Persistent
public class XmlDeclaration
extends AbstractReportable

This class is used to hold information about an XML declaration discovered during parsing of an XML instance. For example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

Author:
rnanders
See Also:
http://www.w3.org/TR/xml/#NT-XMLDecl

protected  String versionFromSAX2
